creator: harisingh.rajput@discusit.com

text: For formula cells, you need to check the cached formula result type, and fetch the cell's value based on that - https://poi.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/poi/ss/usermodel/Cell.html#getCachedFormulaResultType%28%29 . You cannot blindly fetch the numeric value for formula cells, as many formulas don't resolve to numbers, eg they give a String or an Error (as in your case)
creator: apache@gagravarr.org
